actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to authorize the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct an investigation and study of the 1973 pricing policies and profit margins of the major oil companies.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct an investigation and study of the 1973 pricing policies and profit margins of the major oil companies. Requires the committee to report to the House as soon as practicable during the present Congress.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct an investigation and study of the 1973 pricing policies and profit margins of the major oil companies.
